On addressing traffic issues: For too long we have been reactive to this issue not proactive. We have had talks with FDOT to work on this issue and expand I-4. I’ve also been floating the idea of contructing an elevated expressway over SR60 to cut down on some of the traffic.

On the Boots to Business bill: This will provide education and training to veterans and their families on how to start maintain and grow their own business. Veterans come to the course with a concept and leave with the tools to create a viable business model!

On health care issues: I am working with the @RepublicanStudy to create a health care solution that is personal flexible and covers preexisting conditions. I have also introduced legislation that will work to end surprise medical billing at the national level.

On the impeachment inquiry: This whole process has been frustrating. A great deal of it has been shut off closed door and with purposeful leaks from Democrats. I’d love to hear from the whistleblower and get some witnesses that aren’t just pushing forward the Dems’ narrative.
